short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate citations in APA, MLA, Chicago, Harvard, and Vancouver formats with Citation Hero's free Chrome Extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Citation Hero is a free citation generator that makes it easy for students and academics to generate formatted citations for websites, books, journal articles, and other sources. 

With a wide range of supported citation styles, including APA, MLA, Chicago, Harvard, and Vancouver, Citation Hero is the perfect companion for anyone who needs to cite sources in their writing.

Simply visit the website or webpage that you want to cite, click on the "Get Citation" button in the bottom left, and select the appropriate citation style. The extension will then generate a properly formatted citation for you, which you can copy and paste into your own document.

Whether you're a student working on a research paper, an academic writing a scholarly article, or anyone else who needs to cite sources in their writing, Citation Hero is an essential tool that will help you get the job done quickly and easily.
